guideForFounder.guideForFounderContent: Underwriter lists a company for ISO.
guideForFounder.guideForFounderTooltip: An underwriter can list a company for free, however, if a company wants to list directly, that comes with a cost.
Only the whitelisted customers will be able to buy the company's ISO, which will last no longer than 7 days.

guideForFounder.guideForFounderContent: Customers subscribe to the company's ISO.
guideForFounder.guideForFounderTooltip: After the ISO, the underwriter gets 5%, the company gets 80%, and the maker gets 15% from the ISO proceeds.

guideForCustomer.guideForCustomerContent: You must create a Qarrington account.
guideForCustomer.guideForCustomerTooltip: Whether you're an underwriter, a founder, or an end user, you're required to have a verified Qarrington account.

guideForCustomer.guideForCustomerContent: You must link your bank account.
guideForCustomer.guideForCustomerTooltip: Each time you sell subscriptions, the subscription payouts will automatically be sent to your linked bank account.

guideForCustomer.guideForCustomerContent: You can buy an ISO or subscriptions.
guideForCustomer.guideForCustomerTooltip: You can always buy/pull subscriptions, but your account must be verified before you can create a sell/push request.
